snippet: The financial crisis of 2008 took a toll on the market, but as the economy improved in Britain and the United States, so has interest in island homes.
abstract: International House Hunting column; three-bedroom Carpenter Gothic house on banks of Blue Hole mineral spring on Jamaica's west coast, is listed at $2.54 million; information about market and tips for buying in Jamaica highlighted.
lead_paragraph: The financial crisis of 2008 took a toll on the market, but as the economy improved in Britain and the United States, so has interest in island homes.
